fantasy-rpg-ui.title: Fantasy RPG UI
fantasy-rpg-ui.dialog.createPreset: Would you like to create and enable the Fantasy RPG UI Theme?

options.title.name: Title Image
options.title.hint: Select the image you would like to use for the title of these windows.

options.background.name: Background Image
options.background.hint: Select the background image you would like to use for these windows

options.foreground.name: Foreground Image
options.foreground.hint: Select the foreground image you would like to use for these windows

options.hideHeaderButtons.name: Hide Header Buttons
options.hideHeaderButtons.hint: This style sheet will hide header buttons for this category until you hover over the button.

options.toggle.checkbox.name: Checked Box State Color
options.toggle.checkbox.hint: Select the color you would like the checkmark to be when checked.
options.toggle.radio.name: Radio Button State Color
options.toggle.radio.hint: Select the color you would like the radio button to be when selected.

genericWindow.name: Enable Theme for all Windows.
genericWindow.hint: When enabled this will apply a generic theme for all window's in foundry. WARNING: These are not handcrafted and may have issues. It is recommended to enable this option along with the options below for the best experience.

inputs.name: Enable Theme for Toggle Inputs
inputs.hint: When Enabled this will apply a the theme to all inputs with the type checkbox or radio.

dialogs.name: Enable Dialog Theme
dialogs.hint: When enabled this will apply Fantasy RPU UI to Dialog like windows in Foundry.

journals.name: Enable Journals Theme
journals.hint: When enabled this will apply Fantasy RPU UI to windows using Foundry's Journal classes.

backgroundLeft.name: Background Image for Left Panel
backgroundLeft.hint: Select the background image you would like to use for the left panel of the journal windows.

backgroundRight.name: Background Image for Right Panel
backgroundRight.hint: Select the background image you would like to use for the right panel of the journal windows.

headerRibbon.name: Journal Title Ribbon Color
headerRibbon.hint: Select the ribbon color you would like to use for the titles of journal entries.

directory-item.name: Background Image For Journal Pages
directory-item.hint: Select the image you would like to use for the items in the Journals left panel.

interface.name: Enable Interface Theme
interface.hint: When enabled you will be able to select and style individual parts of the user interface.

controls.name: Enable Controls Theme
controls.hint: When enabled you will be able to control the style of UI Controls of Foundry
controls.mainStyle.name: Main Controls Button Style
controls.mainStyle.hint: Changes the Style of the Main Controls in Foundry.
controls.subStyle.name: Sub Controls Button Style
controls.subStyle.hint: Changes the Style of the Sub Controls in Foundry.
controls.toggleStyle.name: Toggle Controls Button Style
controls.toggleStyle.hint: Changes the Style of the Toggle Controls in Foundry.

navigation.name: Enable Scene Navigation Theme
navigation.hint: When enabled you will be able to control the style of the Scene Navigation Control in Foundry

players.name: Enable Players Theme
players.hint: When enabled you will be able to control the style of the Players Control in Foundry

hotbar.name: Enable Hotbar Theme
hotbar.hint: When enabled you will be able to control the style of the Hotbar Control in Foundry
hotbar.macroBorder.name: Border Color
hotbar.macroBorder.hint: Choose the border color you would like to use for the macros in the hotbar.
hotbar.macroOverlay.name: Border Color
hotbar.macroOverlay.hint: Choose the overlay color you would like to use for the macros in the hotbar.

sidebar.name: Enable Sidebar Theme
sidebar.hint: When enabled you will be able to style individual parts of the Sidebar in Foundry.

options.compact.name: Enable Compact Theme
options.compact.hint: When enabled this will apply a compact theme option to this option.

nav.name: Enable Sidebar Navigation Theme
nav.hint: When enabled it will style the navigation bar used in Foundry's Sidebar.

chat.name: Enable Sidebar Chat Theme
chat.hint: When enabled it will style the Chat Tab used in Foundry's Sidebar.
chat.messages.name: Enable Chat Messages Theme
chat.messages.hint: When enabled it will style the chat messages in the Chat Tab used in Foundry's Sidebar.

scenes.name: Enable Sidebar Scenes Theme
scenes.hint: When enabled it will style the Scenes Tab used in Foundry's Sidebar.

settings.name: Enable Sidebar Settings Theme
settings.hint: When enabled it will style the Settings Tab used in Foundry's Sidebar.

ribbon.generalInfo.name: General Info Ribbon Color
ribbon.generalInfo.hint: Select the ribbon color you would like to use for the General Info heading.
ribbon.gameSettings.name: Game Settings Ribbon Color
ribbon.gameSettings.hint: Select the ribbon color you would like to use for the Game Settings heading.
ribbon.helpAndDocumentation.name: Help And Documentation Ribbon Color
ribbon.helpAndDocumentation.hint: Select the ribbon color you would like to use for the Help And Documentation heading.
ribbon.gameAccess.name: Game Access Ribbon Color
ribbon.gameAccess.hint: Select the ribbon color you would like to use for the Game Access heading.

foundry-taskbar.name: Enable Theme for Taskbar
foundry-taskbar.hint: When enabled it will style elements used in the Module Taskbar by theripper93.
